necessity.title: The Necessity of Explainable AI in Medicine
necessity.text: Explainable AI (XAI) ensures clinicians understand, trust, and verify AI-driven decisions, improving patient safety and care quality.

textual.title: Textual Justification: The AI's Rationale in Your Language
textual.example_en_text: The lesion in the left hemisphere shows high probability of demyelination based on voxel intensity analysis.
textual.example_az_text: Sol hemisferdəki lezyon voxellərin intensivliyinə əsasən demielinasiyaya ehtimalının yüksək olduğunu göstərir.
textual.footnote: *These textual examples allow clinicians to understand the AI's reasoning in their own language.

uncertainty.title: Uncertainty Quantification: The AI Knows What It Doesn't Know
uncertainty.desc: By quantifying uncertainty, the AI signals cases that require further human review. Confidence scores allow clinicians to prioritize high-risk or ambiguous cases, improving patient safety and optimizing workflow efficiency.
